item.title: Setting up a PostgreSQL Lab using Vagrant and Ansible on Windows (WSL 2 with VirtualBox)
item.description: Install VirtualBox on Windows c:\>"c:\Program Files\Oracle\VirtualBox\VBoxManage.exe" --version 6.1.36r152435 Install Vagrant on Windows c:\>vagrant --version Vagrant 2.3.0 WSL 2 c:\>wsl --list --verbose NAME STATE VERSION * docker-desktop-data Stopped 2 Ubuntu Running 2 docker-desktop Stopped 2 Install Vagrant on WSL 2 Doc: https://www.vagrantup.com/docs/other/wsl “When Vagrant is installed on the Windows system the version installed within the Linux distribution must match.
